## Año 1990

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
base_espacial_90 <-  st_read("../data/Mapa_de_grado_de_marginacion_por_entidad_federativa_1990/IMEF_1990/IMEF_1990.shp")

selectInput("poligonos", label="Colorear por:", choices = names(base_espacial_90))
```

```{r}
tm_shape(base_espacial_90)+
               tm_polygons(input$poligonos,palette = "BuPu",border.col = "white",border.alpha = 0.5,title="1990")+
               tm_style("white")+
               tm_compass( position = c("LEFT", "BOTTOM"),cardinal.directions = c("N", "E", "S", "W"))
```
